DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether chronic moderate sleep restriction effect amount body fat lean mass loss , calorie expenditure , individual participate dietary weight loss program .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign 8-week program either restrict diet alone , restrict diet restricted sleep 5 day week . The total expected duration participation approximately 3 month .
DOC.criteria: age 3555 year , BMI 3035 kg/meters square , total sleep time 6.58 hour work require change schedule , use sleep aid sleep medication
